summary: Makes Sheogorath look more like he did in Daggerfall
descriptionHtml:
I wanted my Sheogorath to more closely resemble his Daggerfall self. This just gives tweaks the settings to make him look more like how he did a few eras ago.

To install, just drop the .esp file and the .bsa file into your Skyrim\\Data folder, and then ensure that the mod is active (checked) when you start the game. To uninstall, just delete the files.
author: Princess Stomper
